description: Answers natural language financial queries with calculations and insights

result.query: Based on my transaction history showing Swiggy: Rs 450 (Jan 15), Rs 380 (Jan 22), Rs 520 (Feb 5), Rs 410 (Feb 18), Rs 490 (Mar 3), how much did I spend on Swiggy in the last 3 months?
result.answer: In the last 3 months, you spent Rs 1,420 on Swiggy.

calculation_details.method: Summed all Swiggy transactions dated within the last 3 months from Mar 3 (i.e., from Dec 3 to Mar 3). Used transactions from Jan 15 (Rs 450), Jan 22 (Rs 380), Feb 5 (Rs 520), and Feb 18 (Rs 410), and Mar 3 (Rs 490).

result.context: All Swiggy transactions in your provided list are dated within the last 3 months, so all are included in the total.
recommendations: Consider reviewing your food delivery spending patterns to identify opportunities to reduce costs if desired.
Set a monthly budget for food delivery to manage future expenses more effectively.
